title: Via Spiga wordmark
content:
![your_file_name.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719000241im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1222.jpg)  
I would love to match the font used for the   
VIA SPIGA wordmark - is this familiar to anyone?
author: anonymous

comments.content: ITC Vienna Extended is close but different

here is something only slightly similar:   
 [http://rotodesign.com/fonts/salaryman/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719000241/http:/rotodesign.com/fonts/salaryman/index.html)   
   
and he was nice enough to give it away for free :D
